name: The Tune Up
introduction: You've got nail...and a full Medi-spa at your (soon-to-be) well-manicured finger tips.
longDescription: The Tune Up boasts a variety of luxurious manicures and pedicures — from organic and invigorating soaks to more lavish decorative nail art. And if you're looking for Medi-spa services (like Botox, fillers or IV therapy), you'll check in with us here and be taken to your therapeutic services.
needToKnows: In order to relax and prepare before your treatment, please check-in 10 minutes prior to your treatment start time
Cancellation policy: Spa treatments are only fully refundable if they are canceled at least 24 hours in prior to the start of the booked treatment.

treatments.name: The Balancing Pedicure
treatments.description: Starting with a foot soak to soften the skin, this traditional treatment is followed by cuticle work and shaping (round, square, ballerina or stiletto)— the service ending with your choice of the perfect polish.
treatments.introduction: Soften, reshape and polish your toes with this on-the-go service, so you can get back to the mezcal cocktail you've been eyeing at the Pink Agave.

treatments.name: The Saving Grace Pedicure
treatments.description:
Starting with a full exfoliation (from your knees down), you’ll be pampered with a soothing hot stone massage for tense, tired legs—followed by an ice-cold gel to alleviate swelling and tightness. The treatment ends with a traditional pedicure—revealing feet so renewed, you may not even recognize them*.

*You will likely recognize them. They are your own legs, after-all.
treatments.introduction: Recover and renew your well-deserving feet with a soothing and restorative pedicure.

treatments.name: The Sustainable Pedicure
treatments.description: Using Kopari™ products—exclusively and free of silicones, parabens and sulphates—this treatment includes a luscious exfoliation, decadent massage and a classic pedicure using 100% organic coconut oil. Leave your toes bare, or opt for some on-deck pop art.
treatments.introduction: Nourish your feet with an au naturale coconut treatment by Kopari™ that is as gentle on the body as it is the environment.

treatments.name: The Saving Grace Manicure
treatments.description:
Starting with a full exfoliation (from your elbows down), you’ll be pampered with a soothing hot stone massage for tense, tired arms—followed by an ice-cold gel to alleviate swelling and tightness. The treatment ends with a traditional manicure—revealing hands so renewed, you may not even recognize them*.

*You will likely recognize them. They are your own hands, after-all.
treatments.introduction: Recover and renew with a soothing and restorative manicure.

treatments.name: The Balancing Manicure
treatments.description: Starting with a hand soak to soften the skin, this traditional manicure is followed by cuticle work and shaping (round, square, ballerina or stiletto) — the service ending with your choice of the perfect polish.
treatments.introduction: Soften, reshape and polish your nails with this on-the-go service, so you can get back to the mezcal cocktail you've been eyeing at the Pink Agave.

treatments.name: The Sustainable Manicure
treatments.description: Using Kopari™ products—exclusively and free of silicones, parabens and sulphates—this treatment includes a luscious exfoliation, decadent massage, and a classic manicure using 100% organic coconut oil. Leave your nails bare, or opt for some on-deck pop art.
treatments.introduction: Nourish your hands with an au naturale coconut treatment by Kopari™ that is as gentle on the body as it is the environment.

treatments.name: Reformation Skin Tightening Treatments
treatments.description:
Using radio frequency and targeting the collagen-rich layers of the skin on your face, neck or body, this non-invasive treatment can be done in just one session with no downtime. 

We're sorry, Sailor, but you aren't able to book this particular treatment in the app. Please book the Medispa Consultation in the app to learn more about our Medispa treatment options.
treatments.introduction: Tighten, lift and contour your skin with Thermage® — the hi-tech skin tightening treatment of your dreams.

treatments.name: Medispa Consultation
treatments.description: Just kidding. Seriously. People will absolutely still know who you are. But you can return from your holiday looking visibly younger and refreshed — getting advice and guidance during this personalized consultation with the Medi-Spa physician.
treatments.introduction: "Who is that?!" - everyone, when you get home.

treatments.name: IV Hydration Therapy
treatments.description: Using vitamin and nutrient-rich solutions, you’ll be able to flush out toxins, rejuvenate your skin and restore your hydration levels through intravenous therapy.
treatments.introduction: Hydrate, detoxify and replenish your body, one IV drop at a time.

treatments.name: Rectify Dermal Filler Treatments
treatments.description:
Whether it’s contouring the face, hydrating the skin or obtaining fuller lips, you can add natural-looking volume to your lower face with no downtime.

We're sorry, Sailor, but you aren't able to book this particular treatment in the app. Please book the Medispa Consultation in the app to learn more about our Medispa treatment options.
treatments.introduction: Get natural-looking volume with our Restylane® family of dermal fillers.

treatments.name: Defiance Targeted Wrinkle Treatment
treatments.description:
Diminish fine lines, prevent wrinkles and rejuvenate your skin with the help of our custom Dysport® cosmetic treatments. Treatment areas include forehead lines, frown lines and crow’s feet. With natural yet visible results, it’s like green juice for your face… kind of. 

We're sorry, Sailor, but you aren't able to book this particular treatment in the app. Please book the Medispa Consultation in the app to learn more about our Medispa treatment options.
treatments.introduction: Soften lines and prevent wrinkles through our Dysport® treatments.
